title: Championship Kha'Zix Chromas
body:
This is a bit of a short question made long but, when are the chromas for championship Kha coming back?(if at all) I had about 16 of them on my old account (a friend got it perma banned while i took a break from the game) and now that my smurf has become my main for the past few months I was just wondering since i really liked alot of them and am personally not a fan of most of his skins. (thought they might've returned with worlds so I waited out on this)

P.S. I've never used the board before, sorry if i used the wrong one. (if so could someone let me know so I could fix it)

replies.body:
The short answer is we don't know.

I don't believe they were confirmed to be strictly limited to last year, but they don't seem the type of chromas to show up in the essence emporiums (if they were we would have seen them at mid-year).

Worlds would be the obvious time to re-release if it was going to happen, but maybe they have other plans. They don't seem to be doing the same this year with Ryze, and Kha'Zix was the first skin they tried this with, so it's a bit of a mystery (possibly to Riot as well).

They could go the way of the red chromas (that you can only get in the limited time bundles), but it also may just be a matter of finding a good opportunity to re-release them.

Player Support may be able to tell you more, but they may also just not have any info: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
